original_title: Sri Lanka’s DFCC Bank sells Rs8bn Tier 2 debt
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s DFCC Bank’s Tier II bond offer has drawn subscriptions of over 8.0 billion rupees and was closing on the same day, a Colombo Stock Exchange filing said.
The bank offered 5.0 billion rupees worth of 100 rupee debentures and a further 3.0 billion if the initial offer was fully subscribed.
DFCC Bank offered 5-year debentures which will pay 15.25 percent a year and 7-year bonds which will pay 14.75 percent.
CAL and Acuity were joint placement agents for the issue. (Colombo/Jan05/2023)
